Description:
Dreaming of a Rural Lifestyle
If you have been dreaming of a rural lifestyle but would still like the close proximity to the coast, schools and shops, then this is what you have been waiting for. Tucked away on the outskirts of Drysdale on the Bellarine Peninsula, this picturesque property features an expansive sugar gum plantation and the remainder of the property contains majestic gum trees, wattles and an assortment of native flora and fauna as well as two dams. Set on Approx 10 hectares (Approx 25 Acres), there is the potential to build your own dream home or resurrect, renovate and extend the original Miners cottage. This property offers the best of both worlds. The large acreage gives you the feeling of being away from it all, but within minutes you can be on the beach, in Geelong or on the ferry to Melbourne. Zoned farming, the area is renowned for its fertile soil and there is plenty of scope for horse agistment and other hobby farming possibilities. Close by are several of the regions award winning wineries, restaurants and the Curlewis Golf Club. An idyllic lifestyle is guaranteed.

Description:
LIFESTYLE HOME WITH SPACIOUS DESIGN
Situated in the beautiful township of Drysdale is this delightfully bright family home on approx. 583m2 which enjoys open plan spaces and a living area which flows out to a sunny north facing garden and undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining and allowing you to make the most of an indoor/outdoor lifestyle! Features of this fabulous home include 3 generous bedrooms including Master with ensuite & WIR, a fantastic designer kitchen with stone bench tops and quality fixtures and fittings plus a second living space, 5.5kw Solar and a double garage with drive through access to the rear. The home is kept comfortable year round with ducted heating and split system cooling and there is an abundance of space and privacy for the whole family to enjoy.

Description:
VIEWS AND THEN SOME
This lovely split level property features 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, 2 bathrooms; the main with a separate bath. The main living area has beautiful polished timber floors, timber cathedral ceiling, a split system air conditioner and opens up to the generous outdoor deck. The balcony is an entertainer's delight with a built in outdoor kitchen and overlooking the fully fenced rear yard. The fully appointed kitchen features stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. There is also a generously sized double remote garage, chicken coup, a 9,000 litre rain water tank and a 3 kilowatt solar power unit. All of this within good walking distance to the boat ramp, golf course, walking tracks and more. Currently tenanted on a periodic basis.

Description:
When Only the Best will do
This beautifully renovated home really does offer the wow factor, blending both practicality & a prime location. Situated in the popular suburb of Leopold, boasting close proximity to public transport, local primary school, and the expanding Gateway Plaza.
Set on an allotment of approximately 654m2, the floor plan is cleverly designed for optimal use of space. As you enter the home you are greeted by the hub of the home, the open plan kitchen, dining and living area. Flooded with natural light, this space is bright, airy and captivating to say the least. The kitchen has been fully renovated and will impress even the fussiest of chefs. Offering waterfall granite benchtops, stainless steel double drawer dishwasher, 900mm gas cook top, built in oven, 2-Pak kitchen and ample storage.
The home comprises three generous sized bedrooms, the main bedroom boasting a private ensuite and walk in robe, while remaining two bedrooms offer expansive built in robes. A second bathroom featuring separate toilet is included and makes ideal family living.
There is a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living. Opening outside you are greeted with your own oasis. Featuring frameless pool fences and self-closing gates, Silvertop Ash decking & two separate alfresco areas which overlook the magnificent 3.7m x 7m inground swimming pool (solar heated). With low maintenance gardens and ample yard space for the kids to play, this property poses the ultimate entertaining environment.
Another highlight of this home is the 6m x 6m rear shed. Extremely versatile it holds potential to be a workshop, a dream man cave, or extra car accommodation to accompany the undercover double carport.
Added extras include ducted heating throughout, split system air conditioning, ceiling fan in main bedroom, as well as, secure high fences surrounding the property and electric front gate for privacy.
This home is an absolute MUST SEE boasting phenomenal presentation and a sensational location, this renovation is move in ready. With no expense spared on quality, this home is sure to impress.

Description:
Panoramic Views in Peaceful Locale
By day or night, the panoramic vista from this spacious 2 storey home is superb. You can watch the sun set over Reedy Lakes and the Barrabool Hills and see the lights ablaze at Skilled Stadium. Located in one of Leopold's peaceful locales, this immaculately presented 4 bedroom home is ready to move in and will appeal to all family members with the features on offer.
Entry to the home is past the swimming pool, complete with decking and private terrace.
Hardwood timber floors feature throughout the ground level which offers 3 bedrooms, all with BIR's and a superbly renovated main bathroom. The lounge opens onto the front deck with the pool beyond and adjacent is the open-plan kitchen and dining area. Equipped with Westinghouse appliances, the kitchen has plenty of cupboard and bench space and overlooks the covered alfresco terrace at the rear of the property.
Upstairs it's all about comfort and relaxation. Imagine waking up in the spacious master bedroom and stepping out onto the front deck with glorious views across Geelong and beyond. The updated second bathroom has double basins, shower and WC. At the end of the day, the upstairs lounge is the perfect place to relax and unwind.
Other highlights of the property are the remote controlled garages purpose built to house both cars and boats, solar panels, year round comfort with split systems, ducted vacuum system and the wonderful close proximity to schools, shops and sporting facilities.
- Immaculately presented 2 storey home in quiet locale
- 4 bedrooms and 2 separate living areas
- Covered alfresco area, terrace and swimming pool
- Remote controlled DLUG and SLUG/workshop
- Superbly renovated main bathroom
- Close to schools, shops and public transport

Quick sale - Motivated seller!
Current Bid $525,000 - 1 Qualified Bidder
The Openn Negotiation has started. (Openn negotiation is an auction that is conducted online and allows flexible terms for qualified buyers). The auction has commenced and the property can sell anytime.
Contact Ross 0457 888 113 or Wayne 0418 521 221 immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
An excellent investment or first home, this well-designed property is only 6 years old and has been meticulously cared for. Set in a quiet little pocket and just a short walk to local shops, schools and transport.
Four bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in robe
Spacious kitchen, walk-in pantry, open to dining and living
North and west facing living with quality deck and alfresco
Remote double garage with rear yard and internal access
Second living as optional fifth bedroom or study
Quiet street, good neighbours a close to shops and schools
Currently tenanted with a healthy return on investment

Description:
Spacious Family Home with Uninterrupted Views
This well-designed family home has been thoughtfully built to provide an abundance of living and entertaining accommodation combined with great yard space, all on a low maintenance allotment of approx. 466m2. The gently elevated site allows clear views of the stunning city lights at night whilst dining with family and friends.
This practically brand-new home comprises the following comforts;
4 x well-proportioned bedrooms all with WIRS, ensuite to main
Additional study/5th bedroom space
2 x separate living zones, ideal for parents and kids retreats
Well-appointed kitchen with stone benches, gas cooking, dishwasher + WIP
Gas-ducted heating throughout
Extras include; good side-yard access, extra sound-proofing between floors, 2.55m ceilings, instantaneous gas hot water, 15amp power in garage ideal for caravans, trades people etc
A truly convenient lifestyle awaits with all your major amenities within just minutes of a walk or short drive including The Gateway Plaza, Leopold Primary School and Kindergarten, the Ash Road shops, the ever popular Community Hub and local library. Public transport is literally meters away, and the Bellarine Highway grants you easy access to both Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula.
Call now to inspect this fantastic family home.

Address: 43-47 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Country and Coastal Living With a View
Situated along the sought after location of High Ridge Drive, impeccable is one word to describe the extent of this estate! Located just over 3 acres with breathtaking views of Corio Bay, it hosts a private tennis court, manicured garden, established hedges and a sizable paddock. It is a prestigious property that reflects maturity, luxury and quality, offering the best of both coastal and rural living. Nothing has been overlooked!
A sweeping driveway will see you arrive at this exclusive, luxury 4 bedroom family home.
Offering an abundance of living, dining and entertainment areas, walking through the grand entrance into the formal living room complete with open fireplace and beautiful bay windows, you will be immersed in the picturesque views of the surrounding manicured gardens. On the other side of the entrance is a reception area that leads guests into a more intimate sitting room or study.
Showcasing a separate formal dining room, this residence boasts a sleek modern Hamptons style kitchen with Miele appliances, an abundance of storage, exquisite white Corian bench tops, and a further two dining areas, one of which opens up onto the spacious main living room. From this room you will be mesmerized with an outlook across Corio Bay, You Yangs and the estate.
At the far end of the residence is the master wing with private balcony (bay views), generous his and her walk-in robes, opulent ensuite with a walk-in shower, twin vanities and soaker tub overlooking the grounds. Adding to this, you will find a further three double bedrooms with built-in robes, one with access to the main double bathroom.
Furthermore, be taken away with the impressive undercover, al fresco entertainment space that extends the possibilities to hold events all year round. Dine with friends and family, and watch the sunset over the dreamy landscape and Corio Bay.
This rare opportunity on the edge of Clifton Springs is connected to everything you'll ever need - close to the centre of town, beaches, parks, schools, sporting facilities and nearby Geelong.
- Security and intercom system
- Solar panels
- Double garage with undercover parking for two cars
- Ducted heating and vacuum, fireplace and split-systems
- Established orchard with farm-size water tank
- Fully-automated pergola for seasonal comfort
- Potential separate accommodation available underneath the house, possible gym or games room
- Idyllic rural life for a growing family

Description:
Equipped for the good life
This classically elegant home will indulge you upon entry. The front study area is perfect for those who like to work from home, separate from the main living areas of the house. The generous master suite has the benefit of an outlook onto the neat and well kept front garden. It also features it's very own spacious walk in robe and ensuite bathroom with toilet, shower and vanity.
A light filled formal lounge/rumpus area located in the middle of the home, a great space for the kids to watch their shows without disturbing the grown ups. Opposite is a formal dining room, capable of seating plenty.
The size of the open lounge area is enough to blow you away, big enough to place the grandest of lounge suites. Watch television, host parties or anything in between, with outdoor access for the furry members of the family. With features such as Westinghouse oven, cooktop and rangehood, breakfast bar and Asko dishwasher, the open plan kitchen and dining are able to suit your every need.
The two other bedrooms of the home feature their own built in robes, serviced by a main bathroom.
Outdoor entertaining is a piece of cake with the patio area extending from the side of the house, with plenty of space for a barbecue, fire pit or outdoor setting.
Enormous yard with more than enough room for a game of backyard cricket or two.
Only just around the corner from the beach.
Features include:
Double garage with single drive through yard access, ducted central heating, split system Fujitsu air conditioning

Description:
Central Bellarine Land
Walking distance to the Clifton Springs Bowls and Golf Club and only a short drive to the Drysdale and Curlewis shopping precincts, potential views with the right building plans (STCA), and plenty of room to accommodate the van, boat, tradies gear.
This is opportunity to build the home youve always wanted, the opportunity to secure the dream, in a location that boasts lifestyle, schools, shopping, wineries, fishing, golfing and more, all that in the progressive and developing township of Clifton Springs/ Drysdale.
This superb parcel of good sized (585m2) land is crying out for a savvy buyer who sees the potential of this centrally located block. Relocating to the Bellarine has never been easier and getting in now is the smart thing to do.

Description:
Premium Family Setting in Tranquil Location
Experience the excitement of coming home to this perfectly maintained and presented property where quality fixtures and neutral tones flow throughout, setting the tone for a practical, modern lifestyle.
Located in a prime position of Leopold, surrounded by beautifully established homes and within close distance to the local school, kindergarten, local parks and the Gateway Plaza. Pristine presentation inside and out, this home has been lovingly cared for since new. Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms plus study, the main bedroom offering a full ensuite and walk-in robe, while the study could double as a 4thbedroom. The formal front lounge area and spacious open-plan family room provide an abundance of space for the whole family and overlooks the well-appointed kitchen. Offering gas and electric cooking, double pantry, stainless steel dishwasher and island bench.
Outside presents a fantastic alfresco entertaining area, enclosed with café blinds and acting as another living zone. The double garage with rear access opening to the large back yard which allows for storage of a boat or trailer.
Added extras include 8x solar panels, ducted heating and split system air conditioning, ceiling fans in bedrooms and a large garden shed for extra storage.
This quality property will appeal to all buyers looking for something they can move straight in without needing to do a thing. An affordable opportunity to secure this family home set in a convenient location boasting easy access to all of Leopold and Bellarine Peninsula's finest amenities.

Description:
Sensational Sea Change!
An attractive facade creates an anticipation for what is not only an eye catching residence but a property that delivers a wonderful warm welcoming 'home' feel. A fine example of a beautiful light and bright property which boasts an enviable orientation and spectacular water views.
A truly exclusive opportunity to secure a stunning residence which has been loved and adored by the same ownership since it was originally built
The primary living zone is bathed in natural light; a northerly orientation further promotes a light and bright 'feel'. A glass sliding door creates a seamless inside/outside living dynamic and showcases spectacular water views
A custom kitchen design serves up a wonderful practical zone; expansive benchtops, excellent storage solutions and stainless steel appliances. A defined dining space is flanked by a beautiful bay window
A 2nd independent living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
3 spacious bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. The 3rd bedroom boasts impressive built in custom cabinetry.
A double remote car garage features dual roller doors and rear yard access for the boat, trailer and/or the jet ski a genuine lifestyle property
Storybook style gardens are simply enchanting and create a tranquil setting
Without a doubt this home was built with no compromise; all the modern comforts and many more fine features to be discovered on inspection
Homes of this calibre, set within a peaceful court location boasting panoramic bay views are as rare as hen's teeth and I would encourage swift action if you wish to make this property 'home'.

Description:
Indoor and Outdoor Lifestyle - Superb!
An immaculate presentation of a beautiful 4-bedroom home with all a family or entertainer could hope for.
Encompassed by verandahs, well-designed living areas with a neutral colour pallet fitted with quality appliances and features. The formal living area features an open fireplace and adjoins the dining or sitting room area. The kitchen is perfectly situated in the home with two dining room options either side with a dishwasher, ample storage space and an enviable Butler's pantry; perfect for those who love to entertain or a large family.
Master bedroom with built-in robes, ensuite with twin vanities, 3 further bedrooms are generous in size with built-in robes. The undercover outdoor entertaining area is 5.7m X 5m (approx.), well designed and equipped for all seasons and occasions; spa bath with safety glass enclosure, flued range hood for cooking and bi-fold doors leading to the rear yard and low maintenance garden areas. The lock-up garage and adjoining car space complete this beautiful family home.
Extra features include:
Wooden Bamboo Flooring
Flued Gas Heating
3.1KW Solar System

Description:
A Hidden Gem
Tucked away in this quiet avenue, you can tell this two storey, two bedroom and two bathroom home is special right from walking through the front door.
The huge front lounge is more than enough for all walks of life, with enough space for the biggest of furniture or entertaining plenty of guests.
An open kitchen and dining area, with perfect view of the garden, are next on the ground floor. A bathroom, complete with shower, toilet and vanity service the bottom level.
Upstairs you'll find two spacious bedrooms with built in robes and an absolutely enormous bathroom, with a spa. The master bedroom offers a water-view from its own balcony.
With it's hedge-lined driveway and mirror tinting on the rear doors, privacy is no longer an issue.
The property has a single lock up garage, low maintenance rainforest-style garden, garden shed, 1.5 kilowatt solar-panel system and is located only minutes from the beach.

Description:
X Factor!
Without a moment of doubt this executive residence announces itself as one of the finest in the local property market! Stylish, sophisticated and showcasing an inclusions list of the highest calibre it is a must see for prospective purchasers who demand uncompromising excellence! A fine example of a contemporary open plan design is complemented by highly desirable lifestyle features delivering the ultimate 'seachange' experience!
Beautifully appointed 4 bedroom home; the luxurious master suite is complete with expansive bay window feature, ensuite and walk in robe
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/dining zone, it is bathed in an abundance of natural light; wonderful use of expansive windows creates a lovely inside/outside connection to the stunning garden/pool setting
The kitchen is 'top shelf' in every sense; sleek contemporary straight lines work seamlessly with earthy textures and tones. Expansive dual stone benchtops (50mm waterfall effect), custom cabinetry, feature tile splashback, Asko integrated dishwasher, Smeg stainless steel gas cook top and the user friendly design brief is sure to impress
A 2nd and 3rd living zone provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
This fine residence will excite 'the entertainer' within; a beautifully appointed decked alfresco with a striking gable roof provides a great vantage spot to take in the landscaped gardens 'or' keep a watchful eye over the kids playing in the pool
All the modern comforts including gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling; an impressive inclusions list and key liveability features ensure this home is winning the efficiency stakes (solar panels etc)
A prime land holding of 684m2 (approx) is tastefully landscaped with an emphasis on low maintenance; established fruit trees, raised garden beds, established turf all complement the tranquillity of a truly eye catching pool setting (fully equipped)
The A+++ location simply cannot be overstated; positioned right in the heart of a boutique pocket of Drysdale. Surrounded by impressive quality homes and perfectly placed to have all of Drysdale's amenities at arms reach (schools, medical services, fully equipped retail sector and a vibrant cafe/restaurant scene. The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay.

Description:
Move in, Invest, or Renovate - The Options Are Yours
Ideally situated in a quiet neighbourhood on an impressive 603m2 (approx.) corner allotment. This original weatherboard home is waiting to be transformed. It lends itself to an abundance of options- to move in, invest, renovate or develop (STCA).
Original with character you are greeted with hardwood timber flooring throughout. Offering a comfortable living area, dining area & functional kitchen, featuring oven with cook top and great storage. The master bedroom offers large built-in robes, and ample natural light with a remaining generous sized bedroom. The central bathroom features shower, bath, vanity and toilet, also a 2nd separate toilet off the laundry, at the rear of the house.
The rear yard offers plenty of space with large workshop shed for extra storage. This is your chance to secure a home or investment in one of Leopold's great locations.

Description:
PRIVATE SANCTUARY WITH VIEWS
Sitting in a slightly elevated position with views of Corio Bay from the living room, is this lovely 3 bedroom home in highly sought after Clifton Springs with delightful manicured gardens, lovingly maintained and conveniently positioned with a bus stop on your doorstep! Featuring a functional floorplan this home is sure to please those looking to downsize or invest or alternatively, the first homebuyer looking to enjoy the wonderful lifestyle that the Bellarine Peninsula offers. The home is kept comfortable all year round with ducted heating, a wood fire and a split system and there is an abundance of storage space in the secure lock up garage.

Description:
Escape the Hustle and Live the Dream
Here is your opportunity to escape the hustle of the city and pursue your dream for a rural lifestyle, whilst being within close proximity to town. Whether it be for accommodating animals, living off the grid or housing multiple vehicles - this holding set on approx. four acres ticks all of the boxes. Enter via a circular driveway with an impressive date palm on display. A generous entrance leads to a cosy formal lounge and then onto an open-plan living area with a brick fireplace. The kitchen presents well with country-style cabinetry, Westinghouse appliances, corner pantry, breakfast bar and eight-seater dining room. Outside there is an undercover pergola with built-in seating to allow for year round entertaining and barbeques. The sleeping quarters is further along the hallway where you will find two double bedrooms with built-in robes and a master boasting a walk-in robe and an en suite. Situated nearby is the central bathroom with a spa bath, shower, toilet and vanity.
Detached from the family house is a workshop/studio with a kitchenette and bathroom. This extra space would provide the perfect teenagers retreat.
Also on the property is an oversized shed for truck or boat storing, several carports, single lock-up garage, garden and chook shed, dam, orchard, raised vegetable beds, tree-lined boundary, water tanks, solar panels and ample established lawn where children will be endlessly amused. With easy access to the Bellarine Peninsula, heart of Geelong and city of Melbourne you will be relishing in an envious way of life. The Gateway Plaza, local schools, beaches and town centres are only a short drive away.
Insights: 1001-1009 Bellarine Highway, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2019.

Address: 27-29 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Neat As A Pin
Nestled amidst the peninsula townships of Clifton Springs & Drysdale this neat as a pin family home is perfection in any ones eyes.
Set on a generous corner block of 623m2 in one of the quietest streets in the area and consisting of four bedrooms, main with full ensuite, you will have all the space in the world for the family or if youre in retirement, have the gran kids stay over and they wont be under your feet. Two living areas create just that bit more comfort.
The kitchen and dining areas are bright and functional with light floor tiles and contrasting dark benchtops, the dining area is complimented with a gorgeous bay window looking out to the north facing rear yard, the main living area is bathed in sunlight via the large windows, and the rear yard has enough space for the kids to play but is simple in presentation and low in maintenance.
The home is warm and inviting, superbly designed, and easily maintained. The double garage is entered from the Eastern end of the property whilst at the Western end there is side access to allow the boat and van to be stored behind secure gates.
Located near primary and secondary schools, central to Bellarines burgeoning wineries and cafés, a stones throw from beaches and fishing spots and shopping just around the corner, you would struggle to get anywhere better.
If you have considered the change to the Bellarine or you are looking to upsize, downsize, resize or just put the feet up, your search for the perfect peninsula home starts and finishes here.
